content.detailedDescription: My friends and i in campbell river bc witnessed 20-30 orbs that appeared twice (ten minutes apart)in the western sky. orange and moving slowly up and down. video available, will wait and see if they were "lanterns" or military flairs through the grapevine.
content.summary: Multiple orbs hanging in sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was out for a walk with a good friend of mine. we���������re walking, talking and drinking one beer. we felt good and the weather was atmospheric. there were just a few clouds in the star-bright night sky. we were walking around the spreehafen in hamburg and at 23:00(approx.) a big and stationary spotlight appeared. my friend had seen this light before but we dont know where it comes from and why it is there. but it���������s a big city with a huge harbour so there���������s nothing to worry about. 

we were looking at the nearly full moon and talked about it. we lowered our sights at the same time and witnessed a strange phenomenon:
a light in an oval or orblike shape appeared in the sky and flew for about a second in a continous straght line. its consistent and in comparison to the assumed altitude of 1000 ft/300 m slow speed could only be compared to a model aircraft. it had a flightangle of approx. 200 degrees in comparioson to the horizon and flew into the north. we both have interpreted this as a slightly shape changing but defined orb in a distance and altitude of ~1000 ft(when i���������m looking at a map the distace could have been much further afar). it was looking as if it wasn���������t in a relation with its environment unlike all these things that the public knows. it was more plasmatic and had no noise emissions. the strangest thing is that we were walking side by side and saw different colours. for me it was like a fireball and golden-yellow (homogenous, intense) but it definately had no tail or other outputs except light in its defined but not fixed shape. for her it was metallic white-blue. it disappeared without any interactions with its environment like it only had put its light off.

i don���������t think that it was illuminated by the spotlight but i have not checked this possibility at the time.

i was more excited because i���������m in the ufo and paranormal phenomenon topics for a longer time. nevertheless we continued our walk because we could not find anymore evidences for another sighting.

while we were looking into the moon again and talking about a hypotetical relation to the sighting i���������ve turned around. wtf there was a fox chasing us in 30 ft/~10 m distance. it was looking at us four times while holding the distance. i heared a crowd of three random people coming towards us on the other side of the dike, so i went nearer to the fox to film it with my mobilephone because the fox would go away anyway at least when the noisy crowd is near enough. and so it happened. all in all the fox made a little confused but curious impression. i���������ve never heard of a fox chasing people in a industry and harbour /ghetto area... but there are many ducks to hunt.

the big spotlight with its source somewhere in the center of hamburg, maybe hafencity, turned off a few minutes after we���������ve seen the ufo and the fox.

we were excited and looked at the moon again at various times but there were no more incidents except some normal drunken or drugged people. i���������ve taken a photo of the spotlight and filmed the fox after i had time to grab my cellphone and make it film. the ufos presence was way too short for a documentation.

i dont know what this ufo was or if it could have been an astronomic event (nothing had impact on its brightness and homogeneity!). maybe it���������s a weather phenomenon i don���������t know. it was a strong wish of mine to see something unexplainable at some time. now i���������m encouraged to continue my way with interesting phenomena and the search for the truth that lies behind our systems. i���������ve got a strange feelingmixture of sobriety and immediacy that lasts at least until now. peace
content.summary: Plasmatic orblike ufo and a chasing fox during the beam of a spotlight

content.detailedDescription: Was testing camera at various zoom levels and focusing approx 60 feet above ground at 20x optical zoom level (no digital zoom).  noticed something in the frame to the left of the subject matter after shooting the image.  location was va hospital in muskogee, ok.  sky was cloudless as seen in photo.
content.summary: Gray disk or cigar shaped

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pics of unusual fingerprint cloud formations. a trail appeared in some light clouds passing above. no noise or airplane in area. looked back at my pics and found this object in one of them. the trail appeared within 3-5 seconds of me looking around for unusual cloud patterns. object is in pic #2.
content.summary: Enclosed photos

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: This is a repost to the original because i did not see the video had sent posted. on a side note the object was seen the next night the same time.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo sighted

content.detailedDescription: At 9:20, may 25th 2013, i took my dogs to the backyard like i do every evening.  looked up in the nw direction of tucson arizona,and was surprised to see about 20-30 red blinking lights just about 30-40 degrees over the horizon.  could not have been helicopters, planes or balloons so i went in to have my mother observe them.  she concurred with my assessment. during the time of observation, 15 minutes total, many of the objects were stationary yet many moved in different directions.  soon they all faded away.  we waited a few more minutes and they all reappeared.  most of them hovering but two went very high in the sky.  at this time we observed a  plane flying to the left of them.  the plane could have been a commercial one, but shortly after seeing it, the objects faded away and were not seen again.
content.summary: On may 25th,2013,at 9;20pm several glowing objects were seen inear nw horizon.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my balcony, staring at the night sky as i am an amateur astronomer.  at this point, i noticed a star light object (slightly bigger then a star moving in the night sky along a directed path.  it this point in time i was convinced that the object was a satellite.  the strange part was that the object got bigger as it appeared that the object was getting closer.  the object then got fainter. the object was moving along a definite trajactory, the object got closer then fainter as if the object was moving towards me then away from me.  as there are planes in the sky at night, the object was from 100,000 feet to about 30,000 feet (when it got closer) (using planes as a reference to judge the distance).  the whole duration of the event lasted about 15 seconds.  as it was very far away and it was at night i could not make out any structure.  when i was observing the event i was convinced it was a satellite, but the movement of the object towards me and away from me, made the event strange.
content.summary: Satellite like object moved in different directions at or above 100,000 feet

content.detailedDescription:
Saw with a friend. i recently checked the dates and times approx and found out that we were not the only viewers that day. at least 4 others saw the same thing se our location, prior to when we saw it. very simple. disc shaped and it looked like a disc that i had seen a picture of from the 1950's. it appeared to be silent and speed about 100-200 mph between cloud cover. full object was visble for under 20 seconds. i never doubted what we saw. the object was silver, like an airplane with what appeared to be rivited sections. it was definately not an airplane, blimp or any aircraft that i have ever seen flying. my father worked in los angeles for northrup aircraft in the 50's and rocketdine. he once showed us a photo of a very similar vehicle at the plant he worked at. i am very happy to report this sighting and i now know that someone else saw it. i think the other viewers were military personell. the flightpath from where they saw the object took it right above us. it was a mid-day sighting with partial clouds. we immediately told someone who replied that we were seeing stars and he laughed. i do not believe that extra-terrestrials come trillions of miles to earth on vacation and that they don't stop over for some r&r. i believe that my sighting was of a secret project by a government, maybe ours. i also don't believe that those same aliens come all that distance just to crash on the earth...So...I know what i saw and i believe that it was made here on earth.
1. the object flew directly over our position. 2.I was looking skyward due to our position on the vehicle.
3.I thought it was a flying saucer. we.
4.I was not shocked, just a bit excited by the event. calm.
5.It flew out of sight northwesterly.

i have no history of mental illness and i live in fremont, california, unless that qualifies me for the aforementioned mental illness, lol, and  near the nothern cal director of mufon evidently. call me.
content.summary: In front of will rogers auditorium ft worth. sitting on car hood reclined against windshield with a friend both saw it. saw on-line that on that date at least 4 other credible witnesses se my location saw it.

content.detailedDescription:
I was relaxing on my back deck, sitting in a blow up pool, to be exact, all by myself.  i had seen some things in the past at night, and to me, those instances were significant, but never made anything out of it.  so, i just leaned back and looked up.  there it was.  i questioned that maybe it was a bird, but i knew that this was entirely too high to be a bird or even a plane, b/c it was round in shape.  i thought maybe a balloon- particularly a weather balloon, but in the past i've seen those and have shiny exterior.    however, the more i looked, the more it simply hovered.  i thought i was losing my biscuits and looked away.  the logical individual in me was simply saying to myself that it had to be some kind of balloon, but the height it was at- that's no balloon.  i watched, and it suddenly seemed as if it started spinning vertically, if that makes sense?  i thought i saw wings, if that makes sense?  i actually rubbed my eyes, and turned.  then, i kept seeing it just hovering, and then it was really crazy- seemed like these orbs or what i'd say an axis is starting to emerge from both sides.  

i almost felt like it knew i was watching.  again, i knew it wasn't an airplane, and still thinking a balloon?  then, it was like it was teasing me- sort of like a back and forth motion.  that's when i got on the phone to call my friend, and it started moving away.  needless to say, my mom, my neighbor were unavailable for me to tell them what i was seeing.  i only got in touch with them after the fact, and i had thought about taking a picture, but something stopped me from doing that.  

whatever it was- it was a dark, metallic color, round, and changed shapes, and what i believe (unless i'm delusional) orbs or some sort of axis...And for me to see it so distinguished as high up- crazy!

i just want some answers, b/c i consider myself level headed.  i lost sight of the object b/c it eventually stopped hovering and simply drifted.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw this round object way up in sky, watched it for 5 mins, then it looked like it started spinning and hovering, thought i saw what i thought are orbs- i had to look away thinking my eyes were playing tricks

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on 440 headed towards us-1 south near hillsborough street exit. saw about 7 (maybe 6) orange glowing orbs. no sound, nothing else, 4 in one group, 2-3 in the other group. one of them appeared to be moving even as i drove under them. they were a bit above treetop height but far too low to be planes (or appeared to be). i happened to see them as i was driving and just saw them ahead. at first i thought maybe they were some kind of lights strung up and quickly realized that wasn't the case. i just stared (and then had to turn my attention back to the road and then looked behind me), and wasn't particularly frightened just, oddly calm. i lost sight of them as i drove by, and they were not there when i went home about 2.5 hours later.
content.summary: Glowing orange orbs

content.detailedDescription: Happened near the harbor in kincardine ontairo. at around 10:00 pm. sitting on the patio at work and looked up and a orange ball of glowing light traveling across the sky. pulled out my cell and started filming after it disappeared. a second one apered from the same as the first. it disappeared at about the same place. then a 3rd one flew in al most same direction and disappeared a little quicker
content.summary: Glowing orange balls of light three of them at different times

content.detailedDescription: I was fishing outside and looking at the sun set, as the sun set a beautiful moon appeared. when i looked up however i saw a clearly light up in glowing white cloud above me. it hovered there and looked like if a spotlight was stuck on it because all the clouds around were dark almost black. and i watched evaporate till nothing. i saw it slowly become smaller so i kew it couldn't be a light or airplane behind it or anything, it lasted a good 10 mins. the moon was a cross the sky and it would not be reflected light because again the clouds around were dark. at first i thought it was just static and made lighting inside of it continuously but as it became smaller it made me clueless. many people saw it with me, i have videos and pictures of it
content.summary: Glowing cloud in dark sky with moon visible across sky (clouds around were dark)

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Driving north on hiawatha ave - saw two round lights over me - pulled over and got out of car. observed two silent round orb like white/yellow lights with red edge or aura around them slowly moving northwest. one was moving around. the other traveling in a fairly straight line. then observed a third object in the distance. the two began moving toward the third which then disappeared and the two original lights began ascending, and increased speed traveling northwest. started directly and only 500 feet above me - definitely not helicopters or airplanes.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Driving north on hiawatha ave - saw two round lights over me - pulled over and got out of car. observed two round white/yellow lights with red edge or aura around them moving northwest. one was moving around. the other traveling in a fairly straight line

content.detailedDescription:
1. four of us were in a hot tub when we saw the object. 
2. its brightness in the sky caught our attention.
3. it was extremely bright and moving fast. we thought it was an asteroid and the women ran into the house scared. when it stopped and hovered and glowed a bright white we knew it was no an asteroid. 
4. it looked like an asteroid burning in the sky coming at us. the women ran into the house. the object stopped glowed bright white light. it then hovered for a few moments before changing directions and altitude from north to west. it was perfectly circular and flew away in an indescribably strange fashion until it disappeared in the western sky. 
5. immediate surprise followed by extreme fear and curiosity. 
6. it flew in the distance in the westward sky and got smaller and smaller until it disappeared.
content.summary: Witnessed fireball like object fly in hover and leave

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting on the back patio with 3 family members when i noticed red lights to the west, over the neighbors house.  i first thought they were fireworks- but quickly realized they were hovering/flying.  there were 5-6 of these orbs-in kind of a question mark shape- i quickly ran to the front yard to get an unobstructed view, and noticed one by one they either started to fade out- or disappear into the cloud cover. one stayed lit for a few seconds more.  i was able to get the kids outside to see the last light in the sky.  i also guessed that these might be chinese lanterns- but i estimate the distance they were at to be too great to be as visible/bright/large- they were as bright as aircraft landing lights- only red.  i estimated their location to be near the indiana border.  they were completely silent.
content.summary: 5-6 redish orbs to my west- each slowly disappearing into clouds (guess)

content.detailedDescription: At approx. 9:15pm, i was hanging out in niagara square with my girlfriend and observed a possible helicopter over the lake. once noticing no faa flashing lights, we continued to observe the glowing sphere go out of view behind a building. we waited approx. 30sec for the object to be viewable again, it was now either further away or far less bright. it was observable for an additional 20 or so seconds, flickered and then disappeared.
content.summary: Observed glowing sphere at a distance, went behind building and then was further away/less bright upon viewing object coming past other side of building.

content.detailedDescription:
My father and i were on the back porch about 30 minutes after the sun had gone down. i noticed an unusual light out of the corner of my eye. i turned to get a better look and still wasn't sure what it was. i got out of my seat and moved to the other side of the porch for a better view. at first, i thought it was a plane. then i noticed that it was orange and not flashing as planes typically do. i called for my dad to look at it too. he was also confused. a few seconds after he got up, a second light, almost identical to the first appeared just south of the first. however, it was bigger and brighter than the first. the first light suddenly disappeared while the second light followed the same path as the first. after a few seconds, the second light disappeared in approximately the same spot as the first.

i have a photo and a video of the event. however, and yes i know this sounds like bull*hit, my phone is currently not letting me send them to my email...
content.summary: Two unusual orange-ish orbs in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was out on the deck around 11:00 pm. looking west. i saw a bright white l.Ght appear in the sky. i asked my wife if she saw it we watched it for about 30 seconds as it rapidly ascended upward to the west. and disappeared. we couldn't believe what we had just seen. it looked like a shooting star in reverse. as it was going out of the atmosphere rather than into it.
content.summary: Star like light appeared out of thin air, accelerated quickly and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were watching tv at home when she noticed something odd glaring on the window.  i got up and went out to the back deck and almost immediately saw a bright orange-yellow asymmetric orb. at first i thought it was a meteorite or a burning aircraft. it was proceeding south. the object seemed fairly close ( under 1 mile). it covered approximately 25 degrees of arc in eight seconds. at an altitude of approximately 35 degrees above the horizon. i called for my girlfriend and told her to go out to the front deck with me. by the time that the object became visible from the front of the house it was approximately half of its original size (initially the size was comparable to a thumb nail at arms length). it faintly looked as though it had a "tail" with a greenish tip but, instead of following behind it actually seemed as though it was leading the object. it was juting out at roughly a 7 o'clock position. after a few moments the object then hovered remaining static in both size and position. it then appeared to get slightly larger and move closer to us, and then began to shrink and drift to the south. shrinking down to the size of a pen-head before disappearing into cloud cover. our impression was that it was moving away, toward the west, giving it the appearance of shrinking. at first i was frightened thinking that something was about to crash, but within a few seconds i realized that it was something that i had never seen before. living in a city with a major airport, and several large hospitals i've seen a lot of aircraft and this looked like nothing that i have never seen before. i did consider the possibility that it may have been a hot air balloon, but the air is fairly still tonight and the object moved too quickly and irregularly.
content.summary: Burning yellow-orange light that dimmed and shrank as it appeared to move away from us

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i walked outside with my granddaughter and noticed a bunch of the neighborhood kids staring at the sky. there were many bright red-orange objects that were floating and moving very slowly before zooming off and then disappearing. after about ten disappeared, we noted that the lights were fading and the objects were turning into black-shaped ufo's that were hard to tell what they were before completely disappearing the view. all of the kids (they were young) were thinking it was some type of balloon or something, but i don't believe it. there were too many, and they were just coming out of nowhere, then disappearing. all in all, there were probably 50. no more came after the brightest one entered the sky, and its lights faded after a few moments before it finally turned into a black looking object and slowly hovered out of view. i'm not sure if it just landed or what. a lot of people saw the occurrence, however-- but none of us know exactly what to believe.
content.summary: My daughter and i walked outside and saw a bunch of kids staring at objects in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
From my 2nd story bedroom window, i just happened to look outside in the night sky towards joliet, il which is about three miles southwest of my residence.  i saw one white orb shining brightly in the sky headed northwest.  at first i thought it was a private airplane headed towards joliet airport, but noticed it wasn���t changing latitude.  as i was watching to see if this was a plane, i noticed two more bright white lights come on which made this craft look like an obtuse triangle.  during the event, the craft did not seem to change direction and all three lights looked connected.  

once the three lights were shining brightly, i woke my husband up and asked him to look outside.  as he got up to look, only two of the lights were shining at this point.  these two lights were the closer of the three and they stayed on for about ten more seconds.  as my husband and i were watching the two white lights shining brightly in the sky, one went out and the other stayed on for about five more seconds and then disappeared.
content.summary: Observied a bright white light over joliet, il that turned into 3 lights forming a triangle headed nw towards plainfield, il

content.detailedDescription:
From st. petersburg, we were watching the may 24, 2013, usaf satcom rocket launch.  the rocket was clearly visable with no visual aid for approx. two minutes.  however, we used binoculars and initially spotted the four lights, pulsating, hovering, and keeping a distance relationship (after spotting with the binoculars, we could barely make the lights with the naked eye).  best guess is that the lights were over or to the east of orlando (but appeared miles from the rocket) and that based on the relationship to the rocket, the lights were spaced 1 - 3 miles apart.  the lights then followed the rocket down range, then disappeared.  at a time when it appears the rocket booster seperated, at least that's what we initially thought, we then saw only two of the lights continue to follow the rocket until we lost visual of the rocket.   no doubt whatsoever that whatever was following the rocket was not conventional aircraft, although we could not define a structure, other that the lights maintaining a perfect diamond, or cross, relationship.  also, no doubt the "lights" followed the rocket down-range.  

been searching on-line if anyone else saw the lights, and found that there were other witnesses.  it happened!

we witnessed it for approximately 1.5 - 2 minutes.
content.summary: Four lighs diamond pattern, 1-3 miles apart, following usaf rocket launch

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home from a friends house around 11:30pm may 18th.  t-section of fern ave. and minton ave. i saw a large transparent rectangle slowly floating form south to north in the sky very far from were i was standing.  i tend to look at the sky when i'm walking at night just to see if there are any stars.  this night was very bright grey and overcast.  i quickly noticed the object.  there was no solid feature, but the rectangle outline was visible against the grey sky.  the outline was consistent with the moving transparent object.  a car came down my street, so i walked away because sometimes cops drive by and i didn't want to look suspicious.  i wish i stayed and continued to watch the object.  i was just very curious.  my coworker told me about mufon and told me to report it.
content.summary: Large transparent rectangle floating from south to north.  distinctly tranparent due to outline against overcast clouds/sky

content.detailedDescription:
on may 20, 2013 around 4:35p.M. my son and i spotted a long greenish cloud moving beside the squall line of a spring storm.  i told my son to look at the cloud.  it looked to me like a battleship and my son said that it looked like an alien ship to him.                                

 on wednesday, may 22, 2013 at 2:35 a.M.(i looked at my cell phone for the time) i woke up for no reason.  i looked out my bedroom window to see if the jets were flying.  instead of jets..Isaw the bottom of a huge space ship almost directly above my fathers home, just hovering.  i thought what in the world!  it had lots of round portals and around the portals were medium grey, elevated foam pads (it looked like to me).  the rest of the bottom was a dark grey color.  i could only see the front and middle of it, the back was over the house.  it looked to be as wide as a football field (50 ft. or more).  i went to check on my son and check the lock on the front door.  i then looked out my bedroom window again and it was gone.  i think this ship was in the cloud we saw, same size.  i was pretty upset after this.  wondering if they saw me looking at it.
content.summary: Space ship above my fathers house

content.detailedDescription:
I've witnessed three separate ufo incidents earlier in my life which led me to finally purchasing night vision gear and the means to capture the event should something occur. i've captured activity every night i've gone out and have recorded everything. i have hours of material, some of which is posted to my youtube account, spendiddragon1

i usually stop my recordings after 60-90 minutes each session as that's pretty much the laptop's battery life.

most objects are disks and orbs, and with night vision there is no discerning any particular color charatceristics other than the ir spectrum in which i record it (either b&w or nv green).

my last two videos, ufos on a dark and stormy night, and how to decloak ufos are probably the most telling of the group. a short excerpt of the dark and stormy video recently aired on ufo planet.

keep up the great work and thanks for all you do!

nick
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.shape: Circle,   Cylinder,   Disc,   Sphere,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Nightly activity captured with night vision ir; go to youtube for splendiddragon1

content.detailedDescription:
Bright white, diamond shaped object, larger, and brighter than venus, observed in early morning sky, through windshield, while driving south on i-355, from rt.64, at the time, it did not seem to be moving, but stayed somewhat stationary. 
approached i-55 exit, & lost sight of object.
always drive this same route to work, never seen this type of object before !
content.summary: Bright white diamond shaped object observe in early morning sky

content.detailedDescription: Buena vista. driving home around 8:30 we looked to the southeast and saw an orange spiral smoke trail, then noticed an orange orb a bit of distance above it that looked to be standing still. it started slowly moving north, stopped again, when a sudden burst of light and a double teardrop looking cloud appeared. the orb then appeared from behind the cloud, and quickly took off going due east.
content.summary: Same as seen in miramar and lake

content.detailedDescription: We were returning from emptying trash at a campsite in the shenandoah river state park, va around 11:30 pm, when we observed a stationary red-orange object glowing about 1-2 miles away under the current cloud cover,  we recognized that the object was very unusual based on observing typical night time objects such as aircraft, balloons, flares, stars, planets, meteors, etc.  as an amateur astronomer for over 40 years, i have never observed anything like this before.  my brother, son, and i observer a stationary red-orange object that was stationary and glowing.  we observed the object for about 10 seconds and then it faded out rather quickly.  the object reappeared about 5 seconds later about a thousand feet above its previous position.  the object glowed with the same color and intensity as before and then faded out about 5 seconds later.  the object never reappeared.  at the time of the observation there were no aircraft in the vicinity and the clout deck was about 5 thousand feet.  the abject did not give off any sound nor did it move in a lateral direction.  this siting occurred at the shenandoah river state park at an estimated elevation of 1100 feet.
content.summary: Redish-orange sphere stationary for about 10 seconds

content.detailedDescription: On march 1, 2013, around midnight, i was preparing for bed, locking doors.  when i went to my back patio door, i saw this bright orange-yellow glowing fireball surrounded by a bright red ring coming towards me in the sky from the west.  it was about the size of a full moon and seemed to be as high as helicopters fly over my yard, but definitely not as high as commercial airlines.  it went directly over my house.  i ran to the front door and went out to the front yard.  it then changed direction and began moving southeast.  i watched it until i could no longer see it, but it appeared to be continuously moving southeast but slightly changed directions several times.  it was beautiful and stunning to see!  it made no sound and had no trail of smoke or lights, and maintained a steady elevation.  i live in a somewhat rural area about 30 miles west of richmond, virginia, in powhatan county.  i felt amazed, awestruck and a little scared as to what this thing was; and ever since, i can't stop watching the sky, wondering if i will ever see it again.  i hope so!  there was no time to run get a camera or i would have missed seeing it.
content.summary: Yellow-orange glowing fireball surrounded by red ring went over my house, then changed direction to se; no sound or trail;

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking pictures at epcot with my 10x optical zoom lens on my ipad 4, when i noticed this ridiculously bright white cloud up in the sky. it looked like the mist version of a cheap cfl bulb, or a tube fluorescent light. it dissipated like cotton candy, and *not* like a normal cloud. we watched it just...Hang. what got my attention was the fact this "cloud" went behind some thunderhead clouds... that would make this thing a) really far away, and b) insanely huge. the pictures i have just do not do it justice. 

while i was taking the pics, and my g/f and i were going "wow! that's a bright cloud!", someone else came up and asked me if i saw the blinking lights and showers of blobs coming out of it. i admit, i hadn't... but one of the pics i later monkeyed with (i still have the original as taken.) shows some odd artifacting around the object. its not consistent with what's in the rest of the pic. dark lines, small circles under the cloud, etc. i do not have the full  ability to bring out the pic's qualities. 


now, before this event, we were on the opposite side of epcot, and had heard a loud "thunder" like noise. neither me or my g/f saw lightening, or heard anything else thunder like. where we were was directly across from where i had taken the pic. i am guessing about 8 when we heard the boom. 

i looked, and someone reported this in miramar, fl around 8 pm on this site. miramar is like 200+ miles from us.
content.summary: Same as what was seen in miramar, fl
